titleStmt.title: Vox populi, or, The sense of the sober lay-men of the Church of England concerning the heads proposed in His Majesties commission to the Convocation.
titleStmt.author: Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Written in part by the Rev. Joseph Boyse. cf. McAlpin Col.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
